hero.title: Protect yourself from phone call scams
hero.subtitle: Detect scams in seconds with AI technology. Upload an audio file to get instant risk analysis.

landingAbout.title: About us
landingAbout.paragraph1: Blacklist is an advanced technology platform using artificial intelligence to protect users from scam calls. We understand that phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam, with thousands of people losing money each year.
landingAbout.paragraph2: With AI voice recognition technology and machine learning, we analyze call content, detect common scam patterns and assess risk levels to help you make safe decisions. Our goal is to create a protective shield for every Vietnamese user.

risks.title: Are you at risk?
risks.description: Phone scams are becoming a major threat in Vietnam. Every year, thousands of people lose money by believing in fake bank calls, prize notifications, or other tricks.
risks.risk1: Fake calls from "banks" requesting identity verification
risks.risk3: Requests for OTP codes or account passwords

features.title: Technology that protects you
features.description: Using artificial intelligence and machine learning to automatically analyze and detect scam patterns
features.feature1Desc: Advanced AI voice recognition technology converts calls to text with high accuracy, supporting multiple languages and Vietnamese dialects
features.feature2Desc: Deep analysis system identifies common scam tactics: bank impersonation, prize notification calls, requests for sensitive information
features.feature3Desc: ML algorithm calculates risk score from 0-100%, providing detailed warnings of suspicious signs to help you make safe decisions and protect your assets

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Just 3 simple steps to protect you from scams
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload call recordings or videos containing voice to be analyzed
howItWorks.step2Desc: System converts voice to text and scans for scam indicators
howItWorks.step3Desc: View transcript, risk score and warning list with specific explanations

cta.title: Protect yourself today
cta.description: Start checking immediately. Login only when you want to save your analysis history.

pageLogin.title: Login
pageLogin.description: Login or register an account to save analysis history and manage your files

footer.description: Protect yourself from voice scams with advanced AI technology

team.title: Project Team
team.description: A community project developed by blacklist.vn team to detect scam content through AI audio analysis.

pageFiles.description: View and manage all your analysis files
pageFiles.empty: No files yet. Start analyzing your first file!
pageFiles.selectFile: Select a file to view details
pageFiles.selectFileHint: Click on a file from the list on the left

pageVoice.title: Voice Test - Scam Call Detection
pageVoice.description: Record directly from your microphone to check if a call is a scam. Just press the record button and speak for 15 seconds.
pageVoice.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support audio playback.

error.title: An error occurred
error.microphone: Cannot access microphone. Please check browser permissions in settings.
error.upload: Failed to upload file. Please try again later.

info.title: How to use
info.point1: Click the "Record 15s" button and allow your browser to access your microphone.
info.point2: Speak for up to 15 seconds (or click "Stop Early" if you want to finish earlier).
info.point3: The audio file will be automatically uploaded and analyzed by the AI system.
info.point4: Results will show confidence score and reasoning within a few seconds.

intro.title: Commitment Statement
intro.content1: Blacklist is a community project built with the sole purpose of protecting Vietnamese users from scam calls. We absolutely commit to not collecting, storing, or sharing any personal information of users.
intro.content2: This project serves community purposes, strictly complying with personal data protection regulations under Vietnamese law.

purpose.title: Purpose of Use
purpose.content1: Blacklist is developed with the following purposes:
purpose.point1: Serve the community: Provide tools to help users detect scam calls
purpose.point2: Educate users: Raise awareness about phone scam tactics
purpose.point3: Protect the community: Contribute to reducing damage caused by scams

dataCollection.title: Data Collection and Storage
dataCollection.warningContent: We absolutely commit to NOT storing any user data on servers or databases. All information is only temporarily stored on your browser.
dataCollection.content1: Blacklist operates entirely on your browser (client-side). All data is stored locally on your device through standard web technologies:
dataCollection.localStoragePoint1: User email (if logged in) - only stored on your browser
dataCollection.localStoragePoint2: Personal profile information (name, email) - only stored on your browser
dataCollection.localStoragePoint3: Analysis history of uploaded files - only stored on your browser

dataUsage.title: How Data is Used
dataUsage.content1: Since all data is stored locally on your browser, we cannot and will never use your data for any purpose. Your data:

allowed.title: Allowed
allowed.point2: Help you manage your analysis history

notAllowed.title: Not Allowed
notAllowed.point1: Not sent to servers or databases
notAllowed.point2: Not shared with any third parties
notAllowed.point3: Not used for commercial or advertising purposes

compliance.title: Compliance with Vietnamese Law
compliance.content1: Blacklist strictly complies with personal data protection regulations under Vietnamese law, including:

laws.title: Relevant Legal Documents
laws.point3: Circular No. 20/2017/TT-BTTTT of the Ministry of Information and Communications

contact.title: Contact
contact.content1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

footer.title: Final Commitment
footer.content: We commit to continuing to maintain the principle of not storing user data. This project will always be a tool serving the community, with no commercial purposes or data collection. Any changes to the privacy policy will be clearly announced on this website.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content1: Welcome to Blacklist - a community project built to protect Vietnamese users from scam calls. By using this service, you agree to comply with the following terms.
intro.content2: This project is developed for community purposes, with no commercial intent. Use of the service must comply with Vietnamese law.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using Blacklist, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the service.

service.title: Service Description
service.point1: Audio analysis to detect potential scam indicators
service.point2: Provide information and warnings about risk levels
service.point3: Educate and raise awareness about scam tactics

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content1: When using Blacklist, you are responsible for:
responsibilities.point1: Using the service legally and in accordance with its intended purpose
responsibilities.point2: Not using the service to perform illegal or fraudulent activities
responsibilities.point3: Being responsible for the audio files you upload and ensuring you have the right to use them
responsibilities.point4: Not attempting to interfere, break, or disrupt the service

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.warningContent: Blacklist is a support tool and cannot guarantee 100% accuracy. Analysis results are for reference only and do not replace human judgment.
limitations.point1: Any damages arising from the use or inability to use the service
limitations.point2: Decisions made based on the system's analysis results
limitations.point3: The accuracy or completeness of information provided

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content1: All content, source code, design, and other assets of Blacklist are the property of this community project. You may not copy, distribute, or reuse without prior written permission.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content1: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the service after the terms are updated means you accept those changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content1: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us:

footer.title: Conclusion
footer.content: Thank you for using Blacklist. This project is built to serve the community and protect Vietnamese users from scams. We commit to maintaining a transparent service that does not collect data and serves the public interest.

pageCookieConsent.title: Cookies & Privacy
pageCookieConsent.description: We use cookies to store your login information on your browser. Data is only stored locally and not sent to servers.

about.pageDescription: Community project collaboration between 3 teams to protect Vietnamese users from scams

mission.title: Mission
mission.content1: Blacklist is a community project developed through collaboration between 3 teams: Gianty, Uway and Techainer. Our goal is to protect Vietnamese users from scam calls through advanced AI technology.
mission.content2: We commit to providing a tool that completely serves the community, with no commercial purpose, does not collect user data, and strictly complies with Vietnamese regulations.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.content1: This project is the result of collaboration between 3 development teams:
partnership.noteContent: Blacklist is not a company or commercial organization. This is a non-profit community project developed through voluntary collaboration between teams.

technology.title: Technology
technology.content1: We use advanced technologies to detect scams:

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Using AI and machine learning to analyze audio and detect scam patterns

security.title: Security
security.description: All data is processed locally on your browser, not stored on servers

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.point1: Serve the community: Project is completely non-profit, with no commercial purpose
commitment.point2: Data security: Absolutely committed to not storing any personal information
commitment.point3: Legal compliance: Strictly comply with Vietnamese regulations
commitment.point4: Transparency: Open about how it works and usage terms

contact.title: Contact
contact.content1: If you have questions or want to contribute to the project, please contact us:

pageFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pageFaq.description: Find answers to common questions about Blacklist

item1.question: What is Blacklist?
item1.answer: Blacklist is a community project that uses AI technology to detect scam calls. The project is developed through collaboration between 3 teams: Gianty, Uway and Techainer with the goal of protecting Vietnamese users.

item2.question: Is Blacklist free?
item2.answer: Yes, Blacklist completely serves the community and is free of charge. This is a non-profit project developed through voluntary collaboration between teams.

item3.question: Is my data stored?
item3.answer: No, we absolutely commit to not storing any user data on servers or databases. All information is only temporarily stored on your browser if you log in.

item4.question: What is the accuracy of the system?
item4.answer: The system uses AI technology to analyze and provide results with a confidence score. However, results are for reference only and do not replace human judgment. You should consider carefully before making important decisions.

item5.question: Do I need to log in to use?
item5.answer: No, you can use the analysis service immediately without logging in. However, if you want to save analysis history for later review, you can log in with email.

item6.question: Is Blacklist a company?
item6.answer: No, Blacklist is not a company or commercial organization. This is a non-profit community project developed through voluntary collaboration between teams: Gianty, Uway and Techainer.

item7.question: How to export or delete my data?
item7.answer: You can export or delete all your data on the Profile page. This feature complies with GDPR regulations on user rights regarding personal data.

item8.question: Can I contribute to the project?
item8.answer: Yes, if you want to contribute to the project or have questions, please contact us through the Contact page. We welcome all contributions from the community.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: If you don't find the answer in the FAQ, please contact us

donate.pageDescription: Contribute to Blacklist community project - Skills, Time, Projects/Data, Infrastructure or Financial Commitment
donate.header: You can contribute in many ways: donate skills & time, send projects/data sources for the Software/AI team to deploy, provide infrastructure, or make a financial commitment (processed according to legal regulations). All contributions are valuable.

leftColumn.title: Choose contribution method
leftColumn.subtitle: You can choose one or more methods. Fill in the information in the form on the right.
leftColumn.dataProtection: Your data is protected. Blacklist has public & private; receiving money will follow a separate legal process.
leftColumn.compliance: Compliance: anti-abuse, anti-defamation, complaint & correction mechanism.
